Detailed Description

Implement this interface to provide a persistence cookie storage backend.

CookieManager provides in-memory cookie storage. To store cookie in disk or other storage media, implement this interface and provide coresponding function to store cookie.

virtual void gaia::net::CookieManager::IStore::onFlush ( ) [pure virtual]

Called when CookieManager is to synchronize persistence storage.

The process SHOULD NOT block this function. If the flush process done, instance of IStore should call its flashDone() method.

virtual gaia::base::Array<CookieManager::CookieData*>* gaia::net::CookieManager::IStore::onLoad ( ) [pure virtual]

Initializes the store and retrieves the existing cookies.

This will be called only once at startup.

Returns:
Currently stored cookies, or NULL if fail to load. The returning array and elements of array will be deleted by caller after use.
